desc.p: The record id, must be SYSTEM
Routing company to be defaulted in order when portfolio is shared based on conditions specified in fields from APP.FIELD to APP.VALUE
A valid COMPANY ID needs to be specified

Field identifying the cross trading (internal) portfolio to be used in a multi company order/execution scenario when portfolio is shared across companies. The value defined here would default in SC.EXE.SEC.ORDERS for the routing company specified.
The record id, must be SYSTEM
Delimiter specified for separating set of values in APP.VALUE. Example : *
SECURITY.MASTER field based on which the conditions for defaulting of routing company is determined.
Must exist as a valid field in SECURITY.MASTER.
Operand associated with APP.FIELD to construct as selection sentence which will be executed to determine the conditions for defaulting routing company.
Input must be one of EQ,LT,NE,LE,GT or GE.

The field associated with APP.FIELD,APP.DELIMIT and APP.OPERATOR. The value in this field read in conjunction with above three fields would determine whether conditions for defaulting routing company are met.
